textBeforeTable: I was a little curious about how support for the parties has varied during the campaign. Here are the highs and lows according to Gallup’s almost-daily index from 24 October to 7 November: without comments Ups and Downs in the Campaign Notes from the Outside of the Inside Jacob Christensen
textAfterTable: I find the stability of the Liberals and Social Democrats interesting. (Both parties record new maximum values in Thursday’s index).
